page.title: 01BOTTESFORD and YADDLETHORPE
page.content: The township of Bottesford and Yaddlethorpe, more commonly known as simply Bottesford, lies on the southern edge of the Borough of Scunthorpe, between there and the village of Messingham. The rising population of about 11,000 relies largely upon Scunthorpe for their occupations. The British Steel Corporation's plant remains the major employer even after the closure and demanning programme of the early 1980's Bottesford Town Council together with Glanford Borough Council have made efforts to attract new employment to the area by creating a light industrial site.
